text: Thomas Patrick Cronin (born 17 December 1932) is a former English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Fulham and Reading. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:People from Richmond, London Category:Footballers from Greater London Category:Association football inside forwards Category:English footballers Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players
title: Tommy Cronin (footballer)
